clarity_phase.description: Discovery and requirements gathering phase - 4 week structured approach

week_4.name: Master of Implementation
week_4.focus: Creating and presenting Odoo solution mockup

standard_tasks.name: Project Kickoff Meeting
standard_tasks.description: Initial meeting with stakeholders to align on project scope, timeline, and success criteria
standard_tasks.description_es: Reunión inicial con stakeholders para alinear alcance, cronograma y criterios de éxito

standard_tasks.name: Current Process Mapping (As-Is)
standard_tasks.description: Document client's current business processes across all departments
standard_tasks.description_es: Documentar los procesos de negocio actuales del cliente en todos los departamentos

standard_tasks.name: Data Migration Assessment
standard_tasks.description: Evaluate existing data quality, structure, and migration requirements
standard_tasks.description_es: Evaluar calidad, estructura y requisitos de migración de datos existentes

standard_tasks.name: Integration Requirements Analysis
standard_tasks.description: Identify all third-party systems requiring integration with Odoo
standard_tasks.description_es: Identificar todos los sistemas de terceros que requieren integración con Odoo

standard_tasks.name: Future Process Design (To-Be)
standard_tasks.description: Design optimized future-state processes leveraging Odoo best practices
standard_tasks.description_es: Diseñar procesos optimizados del estado futuro aprovechando las mejores prácticas de Odoo

standard_tasks.name: Customization Scoping
standard_tasks.description: Document customizations needed beyond standard Odoo functionality
standard_tasks.description_es: Documentar personalizaciones necesarias más allá de la funcionalidad estándar de Odoo

standard_tasks.name: Process To-Be Review & Client Approval
standard_tasks.name_es: Revisión de Procesos To-Be y Aprobación del Cliente
standard_tasks.description: Present optimized processes to client and obtain approval before creating Master of Implementation
standard_tasks.description_es: Presentar procesos optimizados al cliente y obtener aprobación antes de crear el Master of Implementation

standard_tasks.name: Master of Implementation - Creation
standard_tasks.description: Create visual mockup/prototype showing how To-Be processes translate into Odoo solution. This is the key deliverable showing the future Odoo system structure, screens, and workflows.
standard_tasks.description_es: Crear prototipo visual mostrando cómo los procesos To-Be se traducen en la solución Odoo. Este es el entregable clave que muestra la estructura, pantallas y flujos del futuro sistema Odoo.
